A few months ago I attended the "68th Advanced Beam Dynamics Workshop on High-Brightness and High-Intensity Hadron Beams" (HB) at CERN. Around 200 researchers attended from the USA, Korea, China, UK, Germany, Italy, France, and Switzerland.  It was a packed schedule, with talks running from 9 AM to 7 PM.
